IN THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST
CLASS-I THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Karthika S Varma
Judicial I Class Magistrate-I,
Thiruvananthapuram
Dated, the 22" day of November, 2024
CC _300/Â°23
Petitioner/Aggreived : Rajesh R, aged 49 years, S/o.Rajendran, TC
person 4/4/3488(3), GRA-D Block, Sreekaryam,
Thiruvananthapuram
(By Adv.Kulathoor L R Rahul)
Respondent 1.Vinod Muthikaavil, Psychiatric Social Work
Officer, Govt.Mental Hospital, Peroorkada P O,
Thiruvananthapuram
2.Alesious Polikkaarp, Vetinary Surgeon,
Vetenary Dispensary, Karavoor, Kollam
Order : Accused is acquitted u/s.257 of Cr.PC.
The above petition having come up for consideration before this Court on 22-11-
2024 and passes the following:
ORDER
Withdrawal Petition filed by the Complainant. Complainant and Accused
represented. The Complainant is present. Satisfied that matter has been settled
between the parties and that the Complainant does not intend to prosecute the matter
further. Hence, withdrawal petition is allowed. Accused is acquitted u/s.257 of
Cr.PC of the offence u/s.500 of IPC.
(Pronounced in open court on this the 22" day of November, 2024 )
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class - I
Thiruvananthapuram
